name: smchat
description: A StarMash extension to run JavaScript from the chat bar.

scripts.build: browserify --node smchat.js | babel -s inline --presets=env | uglifyjs -cm > smchat.min.js
scripts.minify2: google-closure-compiler-js smchat.js --languageIn ES6 --compilationLevel ADVANCED --externs externs.js > smchat.min.js

author: STEAMROLLER
